channel.title: Adding Items To Shop ~ Something Weird
channel.description:
I may just be simply miss judging something,
but whenever I add an item to any shop in the shops.cfg, the complier doesn't like it, no matter how correct it is, have I over looked something here ?
I put the Fire Cape and the 4 Stat Boosting Rings into a shop, now whenever you go to that shop the client crashes. ......

item.title: Adding Items To Shop ~ Something Weird
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

Make sure it’s not glitched?

Read full topic

@Prozor wrote:

Ah that really might be it.

Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 12:44:27 PM[/size][hr]I put the Fire Cape in and the 4 Rings, now when you go to the shop it crashes the client = /
